description:
Sales of beer

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73421 Beer tax statistics

Definition:
The sales of beer are the quantities on which tax was paid
and the tax-exempt quantities, excluding beer with an
alcoholic strength by volume not exceeding 0.5% vol
(non-alcoholic beer, malt beverages) and including beer
mixed with other beverages.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Sales of beer
